title: Print, Designs for Two Chairs, Table, and Hassock in Gothic Style
title_raw: Designs for Two Chairs, Table, and Hassock in Gothic Style
medium: Print on hand-colored, heavy, cream wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted on plate, below image: Gothic Furniture / No 35 of R. Ackermann's Repository of Arts etc., Pub. Novr 1, 1825; and upper right margin: Pl. 29 Vol. VI
description: Two gothic-style chairs, with and without arms, flanking a table and hassock; brush and watercolor additions in red, yellow, and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Designs for Two Chairs, Table, and Hassock in Gothic Style. Print on hand-colored, heavy, cream wove paper. 
Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-401.
